attributes.action: Assist The UK Travel Industry through the Corona Crisis.
attributes.additional_details:
Agents, Homeworkers, Tour operators, Cruise lines  need to cover loss of revenue and associated costs on cancelled bookings and losses of previously predicted sales.

Give us access to a fund, act as guarantor so we can access it via our banks by presenting our Corona losses. Make it available now. Make it “claimable” upon presentation of evidence of costs incurred or sales lost.

Don’t dither, the alternative is going to be a series of massive claims on the air travel fund as well as tens of thousands of unemployment claims and the complete decimation of the uk travel industry.
attributes.background:
We need you to help us stay as close as we can to our 2020 forecast business models whilst we rearrange travel for your citizens repatriate and assist overseas clients. 

Give the industry emergency 10 year lending at 2% over base.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302233

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
